A local branch of the esteemed Indian café chain Cafe Coffee Day in Civil Lines is counted among the best coffee shops of this city. Frequented by coffee lovers from the neighbourhood and the surrounding places it enjoys valuable patronage of its customers. This renowned café chain is owned and operated by Coffee Day Global Limited which is a subsidiary of Coffee Day Enterprises Limited. The first outlet set its foot in the city of Bangalore in 1996 and ever since that time this establishment has seen an exponential growth in terms of its customers and branches. Looking at the remarkable success in this country the company decided to spread its wings in other countries too such as Malaysia Austria and Czech Republic which have fully-functional branches in some of the most prominent locations. Subway Restaurant Swaroop Nagar Kanpur. Check Out The Subway Takeaway Menu. Visit Justdial For Subway Kanpur Address Contact Number Reviews & Photos

Amongst the several fast food outlets spread across the city Subway Restaurant in Swaroop Nagar Kanpur is one that serves fresh submarine sandwiches and salads. The history of Subway goes way back to 1965 the year of its inception in Connecticut United States. What started out as a single shop for serving sandwiches has over the decades bloomed to into the largest quick service restaurant chain in the world. With over forty thousand brand outlets across more than a hundred countries this submarine sandwich brand thrives on their tag-line 'Eat Fresh'. One outlet after the other the Subway brand of restaurants has changed the landscape of the food service industry. This particular outlet is situated at Shop No 113/121 Block A Swaroop Nagar Road near Swaroop Nagar Road. Undoubtedly it is one of the best fast food restaurants in Swaroop Nagar Kanpur.

Ambience and Services available at Subway Restaurant

Enter into any Subway Restaurant in Kanpur and be welcomed by the aroma of freshly baked bread. They take immense pride in baking their own bread that forms the crux their core offering; a good submarine sandwich or sub. With minimal décor and limited seating arrangements this air-conditioned outlet encourages self-service. Customers have the privilege of watching their food being freshly prepared right in front of their eyes. The menu of every outlet is pretty standardized in its offerings. Every order is put together in an assembly line. Choose from the standard subs on the menu classified into Egg Subs Veg. Subs and Non-Veg. Subs. The affable staff always asks customers their preference of bread the size of the sandwich and the choice & amount of toppings condiments and sauces. One can also choose to add sides like a bag of chips beverage or a dessert from the menu. Alternatively one can opt for a salad instead of a sandwich as well. Guests have the complete freedom to customize their order by adding or removing ingredients and condiments. Fitness conscious diners can select from 97% fat free sub variants. This outlet provides home delivery and take away facilities. To view their entire range of offerings click on the green 'Menu' button.

Pizza Hut Mahanagar Lucknow. Get Pizza Hut Menu Price Address Phone Number Offers Reviews Photos on Justdial. Order Pizza online and Get Home Delivery in Mahanagar Lucknow.

One of the well-known outlets of the popular pizza chain Pizza Hut at Mahanagar Lucknow belongs to the Indian subsidiary of the parent company based in the United States. Founders Dan and Frank Carney started their own pizzeria in the year 1958 and since then there's been no looking back. Over the years they've come a long way with more than 13 200 outlets across the globe. In India the restaurant chain made its pioneering presence in 1996 with its flagship store in Bangalore. It has received many laurels for its food service and hospitality the most notable being 'Most Trusted Food Service Brand' by Brand Equity for 11 years in a row. Their exciting menu offers more than just their signature pizzas. Soups salads appetizers pastas desserts and beverages feature on the menu making it complete dining experience for the family. This particular outlet can be easily located at B-939 / A Premjyoti Tower . Undoubtedly it is one of the best pizza outlets in Mahanagar Lucknow.

Stylish wooden dining chairs and polished tables are the seating arrangements in this spacious dining area. Address: 26/118  Sanjay Place  Agra - 282002  Opposite Income Tax Office
Info:
Aahar Fast Food & Restaurant in Sanjay Place Agra

This is a multi cuisine restaurant is located at the heart of Agra also known as the city of Taj. Aahar Fast Food & Restaurant was started in the year 1991 as a small pastry shop. Over the years and with the efforts of Mr. Satya Pal Arora who is also the owner of the place the pastry shop is now a full-fledged restaurant. Aahar Restaurant Agra is located at Sanjay Place.

The restaurant was among the first to offer home delivery service in the city. They deliver almost all over the city and the distance covered is based on how big the order is. They have a good team of delivery boys who are well versed with all the major areas of the city so they can always reach on time.

The restaurant offers Navratra Thali during the auspicious Navratras. They also carry out special arrangements for Birthday and Kitty parties. They also provide special packages for corporate customers.

Aahar Restaurant Agra Menu

The restaurant serves North Indian South Indian Chinese and various Chaats Sweets Cakes Milkshakes and more. The place is known for its quality food. The restaurant has a good ambiance and hygiene is maintained really well at all times. The waiters are polite and the service is very efficient.

One can choose from their range of Thalis if they do not want to take the trouble of going through the menu or want to try more options in limited amounts. One can choose from Mini Thali Plain Thali Special Thali Maharaja Thali Chinese Thali South Indian Thali and Chaat Thali.

Some of the dishes one can enjoy here are the Talumein Cream of Mushroom Baby Corn Spinach Long Fong Spring Rolls Paneer Cutlet Veg. Pakoda Plain Dhokla Dosa Masala Paneer Uttapam Choley Bhature Pao Bhaji Cheese Burger Cheese Veg. Sandwich Grilled Cheese (Margherita) Spicy Paneer Golden Corn Veggie Singaporean Chowmein Almond Rice Gobhi Manchurian Chilli Mushroom Assorted Vegetables in Hot Bean Sauce Dal Makhani Kadhai Paneer Malai Kofta Dum Aloo Kashmiri Paneer Dilbahar Kaju Curry Kashmiri Pulao Stuffed Parantha and Paneer Naan.

One can enjoy Chaat items like Raj Kachori Aloo Tokri Golgappe Aloo Tikki Dahi Bhalla Papri Chaat Bhalla Papri Bhelpuri and Mixed Chaat.

They offer a range of pastries like Pineapple Black Forest Butter Scotch Pure Chocolate Mango Strawberry and Chocolate Pyramid. They also offer Milkshakes with various flavours like Vanilla Strawberry Mango Pineapple Chocolate Banana and Dark Secret.

Address: 25  Deepshikha Towers  Sanjay Place  Civil Lines  Agra - 282003
Info:
Pizza Hut in Civil Lines Agra

Pizza Hut in Agra. Italian Restaurants with Address Contact Number Photos Maps. View Pizza Hut Agra on Justdial.

One of the well-known outlets of the popular pizza chain Pizza Hut at Civil Lines Agra belongs to the Indian subsidiary of the parent company based in the United States. Founders Dan and Frank Carney started their own pizzeria in the year 1958 and since then there's been no looking back. Over the years they've come a long way with more than 13 200 outlets across the globe. In India the restaurant chain made its pioneering presence in 1996 with its flagship store in Bangalore. It has received many laurels for its food service and hospitality the most notable being 'Most Trusted Food Service Brand' by Brand Equity for 11 years in a row. Their exciting menu offers more than just their signature pizzas. Soups salads appetizers pastas desserts and beverages feature on the menu making it complete dining experience for the family. This particular outlet can be easily located at 25 Deepshikha Towers Sanjay Place. Undoubtedly it is one of the best pizza outlets in Civil Lines Agra.

Ambiance and Services available at Pizza Hut

The bright iconic logo of the brand atop Pizza Hut near Civil Lines Agra makes this venue easy to spot. An usher pleasantly greets customers right outside the outlet and leads them to their table. Enter the restaurant to the well-lit and radiant interiors. Adding to the inviting ambiance is the contemporary wooden décor and design of the venue. Stylish wooden dining chairs and polished tables are the seating arrangements in this spacious dining area. Be it couples or families diners belonging various groups and sizes can be comfortably accommodated here. Home delivery as well as take-away services are also available. Right from opening time the service crew is prompt in service. On the menu pizzas categorized as Magic Pan Pizzas Classic Pan Pizzas Cheese Maxx Pizzas and Overloaded Big Pizzas. Weekday Lunch meal and The Giant Dinner Meal Pizza options are also available. To know more about various offerings just scroll up and click on the 'Menu' button.

Frequently Ordered Items

Relish a range of flavours at Pizza Hut in Delhi with Chicken Caesar Salad Saucy Chicken Wings Go Italia Spaghetti Creamy Mushroom Fusilli Triple Chicken Feast Pizza Chicken Italiano Pizza Panneer Vegorama Pizza Spice Overload Pizza Classic Chicken Pizza Choco Mousse and Choco Truffle Cake.

One of the well-known outlets of the popular pizza chain Pizza Hut at Sikandra Agra belongs to the Indian subsidiary of the parent company based in the United States. Founders Dan and Frank Carney started their own pizzeria in the year 1958 and since then there's been no looking back. Over the years they've come a long way with more than 13 200 outlets across the globe. In India the restaurant chain made its pioneering presence in 1996 with its flagship store in Bangalore. It has received many laurels for its food service and hospitality the most notable being 'Most Trusted Food Service Brand' by Brand Equity for 11 years in a row. Their exciting menu offers more than just their signature pizzas. Soups salads appetizers pastas desserts and beverages feature on the menu making it complete dining experience for the family. Accommodation at Godwin Hotel Meerut

The tastefully done up interiors fill the guests with a deep sense of satisfaction making a lasting impression. Divided in the categories of Premium Rooms Superior Rooms and Presidential Suites all the accommodation spaces are equipped with 1 king size bed or 2 single beds individually controlled air conditioning direct dial telephone fridge mini bar LCD with satellite channels Wi-Fi internet access 24 hour room service tea & coffee maker and a hair dryer. One of the well-known outlets of the popular pizza chain Pizza Hut at Shastri Nagar Meerut belongs to the Indian subsidiary of the parent company based in the United States. Founders Dan and Frank Carney started their own pizzeria in the year 1958 and since then there's been no looking back. Over the years they've come a long way with more than 13 200 outlets across the globe. In India the restaurant chain made its pioneering presence in 1996 with its flagship store in Bangalore. It has received many laurels for its food service and hospitality the most notable being 'Most Trusted Food Service Brand' by Brand Equity for 11 years in a row. Their exciting menu offers more than just their signature pizzas. Soups salads appetizers pastas desserts and beverages feature on the menu making it complete dining experience for the family. Be it couples or families diners belonging various groups and sizes can be comfortably accommodated here. Home delivery as well as take-away services are also available. Right from opening time the service crew is prompt in service. On the menu pizzas categorized as Magic Pan Pizzas Classic Pan Pizzas Cheese Maxx Pizzas and Overloaded Big Pizzas.
